text: 1.15: Sng 7.14; Ro 5.19-21Mba ndavi khavi tɨv, ana nza ndavi vherir kim, nza mbik ndavar ki fara muuŋgiap wari ki. Ana kav zumgum nza ndavi khavim, nza tɨva mbatɨgeŋ muuŋgi. Nza mba tɨva mbatɨgeŋ muuŋgim, ne kɨrar hɨgap, mbik tara tegi fara muuŋgi. Mba tɨva mbatɨgeŋ nzan ka vov, kɨvgiap, nza shogim, nza rimgi.
